testcase.classname: To resgister a new user , login and then make payment with otp.
testcase.name: To register a user
testcase.system-out: Given User is in Register Page..............................................passed When User enters the First Name.............................................passed And User enters the NameID..................................................passed And User enters the Email...................................................passed And User enters the UserName................................................passed And User enters the Password................................................passed And User enters the Confirm Password........................................passed Then User clicks on Register button.........................................passed And User clicks on click here to login......................................passed

testcase.classname: To resgister a new user , login and then make payment with otp.
testcase.name: To make a payment
testcase.system-out: Given User is in Login Page.................................................passed When User enters username...................................................passed And user enters password....................................................passed And user clicks on Login button.............................................passed And user is redirected to paybill page......................................passed Then user enters dayofpayment...............................................passed And user enters amount......................................................passed And user enters SwiftCode...................................................passed And user clicks on make payment.............................................passed And user is redirected to otp page..........................................passed And user enters the otp.....................................................passed And user clicks on submit otp...............................................passed And user should see the payment successful page.............................passed
